MiniHakkero.NAME: Mini-Hakkero
MiniHakkero.FLAVOR: Aka mini-EightTrigram Furnace,is originally gift by Rinosuke when Marisa left her parents.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card,gain 1  Charge-up .

EnhancedHakkero.NAME: Enhanced Hakkero
EnhancedHakkero.FLAVOR: At Marisa's request,Rinosuke repaired and upgraded the Hakkero once.Now its flame burns brighter.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card,gain 2  Charge-up .

MagicArmor.NAME: Magic Armor
MagicArmor.FLAVOR: In fact I don't know what the hell is this,but since the Designer put it in the Plan,here it is.-programmer
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a Status or Curse,gain 4 Block .

EnhancedBroom.NAME: Enhanced Broom
EnhancedBroom.FLAVOR: Marisa always travels with her flying broom,and now it is upgraded.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 3 cards that cost 0 you played,draw a card.

AMDumbbell.NAME: Amplitude Modulation Dumbbell
AMDumbbell.FLAVOR: This thing sounds really stupid.I really don't understand.-programmer
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate Amplify effect ,gain 1 Strength.
